== Contacting the Community ==

If you want to get in touch with the community, you can use the following methods:

* To reach general members of the community for some chatter, you can join <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.net-ubuntu-community-team|#ubuntu-community-team on irc.freenode.net]]</nowiki>
* To contact organization admins, mentors and fellow students, you can join <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.net-ubuntu-google|#ubuntu-google on irc.freenode.net]]</nowiki>
